about_the_game:
Discover a tale of ancient enmity and hope in The Light of the Darkness: Renascence, a Metroidvania game that draws inspiration from beloved classics while embracing modern gaming advancements. Delve into the mysterious Lands of Oblivion, a cursed realm nestled between the contrasting worlds of Light and Darkness. Take on the role of the singular hybrid, a being conceived from both worlds, yet alien to both. Withstand the disdain of the Pales and the Darks as the narrative unfolds through sophisticated cutscenes, revealing a rich, original story that digs deeper than ever before.



Sephius The Hybrid

In a universe of untold fantasies, an enigmatic being awakens with no memories, trapped between the opposing realms of Light and Darkness. Fragmented visions of a luminescent world plague his mind.


On the brink of death, a Pale hero whispers a secret to him: they are all ensnared in this barren wasteland. The key to freedom? A wise elder and a girl whose name echoes in the stranger's visions.

With a whispered promise and memories flickering on the edge of his consciousness, he embarks on an odyssey to piece together remnants of his past and unravel the mystery that binds them to these arid lands. In his quest, not only redemption awaits him but also revelations that could alter the fate of two worlds.




Caracteristics


  • Metroidvania Reimagined:
Engage in a gameplay experience that honors the Metroidvania tradition, enriched with modern 3D AAA visuals, an array of new features, and an elaborate storyline.



  • Essence Absorption:
Absorb essences from other beings, allowing the player to gain strength and abilities. Discover a diverse combination of elements, natures, and personas that can be merged into a multitude of spell variants.



  • Enhanced Gameplay Mechanics:
Revel in a host of new abilities, challenging puzzles, and epic boss battles. The gameplay elements have been finely tuned to offer a balanced blend of challenge and reward.



  • AAA 3D Visuals:
Immerse yourself in a world crafted with high-fidelity graphics, realistic lighting, and a level of detail that brings the eerie Lands of Oblivion to life. Encounter beautifully detailed models and environments with a fine-tuned, intuitive interface.



  • Engrossing Narrative:
Delve into a more nuanced and expansive narrative. Unravel the complex history between the Pales and the Darks, and your pivotal role as the sole hybrid destined to alter the tides of an ancient feud.



  • Cinematic Cutscenes:
Experience the unfolding narrative through polished cutscenes that add depth to the storytelling, exploring themes of identity, acceptance, and the dire need for unity.



The Light of the Darkness: Renascence extends an invitation to explore a hauntingly beautiful realm, laden with secrets, challenges, and a narrative waiting to be unraveled. The game’s enhanced storytelling, coupled with sophisticated cutscenes and refined gameplay dynamics, offers a captivating journey through a world embroiled in conflict and a solemn hope for reconciliation. Add to your wishlist and brace yourself for a memorable exploration of the enigmatic Lands of Oblivion.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence including sword fights  and dead bodies

name: The Light of the Darkness: Renascence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a riveting journey in The Light of the Darkness: Renascence, a Metroidvania game with modern 3D AAA visuals. Explore the cursed Lands of Oblivion as the unique hybrid, facing ancient foes amidst a rich narrative. Unveil secrets through sophisticated cutscenes and challenging gameplay.
